title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks post back-to-back sessions of gains as traders await Fed - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks post back-to-back sessions of gains as traders await Fed  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stock futures opened slightly lower Monday evening after a whipsaw session in markets during the regular trading day, as investors appraised the next moves by the Federal Reserve and a fresh batch of quarterly earnings results.
